content: Does anybody who is more knowledge about other proof assistants know what the status of ODE libraries (esp. existence/uniqueness) is in other formalisation projects? Say, there could be a standalone library or something hidden in a larger formalisation project. @Yury G. Kudryashov and I would like to see how the current theory in mathlib compares with other efforts.
More generally, more papers by Fabian Immler should be relevant.
We're trying to figure out whether we have something new that wasn't formalized elsewhere.
